title: Cherries

adjectives: Tasting or smelling richly of or as of fruit
Having or showing good taste; tasteful.
Extremely pleasing to the sense of taste
Of a color at the end of the color spectrum (next to orange); resembling the color of blood or cherries or tomatoes or rubies
Bright red in color, like the color of fresh blood.
Of the purplish red colour shade carmine.
Pleasing to the sense of taste.
Pleasing to the sense of taste
verbs: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.
nouns: Any of numerous trees and shrubs producing a small fleshy round fruit with a single hard stone; many also produce a valuable hardwood
Fruit of many plants of the genus Prunus
A tree of the subgenus Prunus subg. Cerasus, the members of which are valued agriculturally for their fruit, the cherry, and the wood of the tree, cherrywood, used in woodworking.
Aka Cerasus, subgenus of the genus Prunus
A small fruit, usually red, black or yellow, with a smooth hard seed and a short hard stem.
Tree of subgenus Cerasus.
The cherry is the fruit of many plants of the genus Prunus, and is a fleshy drupe.
A small fruit, usually red, black or yellow, with a smooth hard seed and a short hard stem (Prunus avium and some other fruits of similar appearance in the Prunus genus).
The ripened reproductive body of a seed plant
Fruit, in broad terms, is a structure of a plant that contains its seeds.
The seed-bearing part of a plant, often edible, colourful/colorful and fragrant, produced from a floral ovary after fertilization.
Part of a flowering plant
A fully matured plant ovary with or without other floral or shoot parts united with it at maturity.
In botany, a fruit is a part of a flowering plant that derives from specific tissues of the flower, one or more ovaries, and in some cases accessory tissues.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: Two rich red cherries with a green leaf and joined at their long stems. May be used to refer to breasts on TikTok and other social media platforms.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, these cherries are presented as a delightful, plump pair, each rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and a smooth, glossy finish. Their vibrant, deep red hue and subtle highlights give them a tactile, almost juicy appearance, with soft rounded edges that feel friendly and appealing. This charming emoji on Apple devices often symbolizes sweetness, abundance, or a delightful treat, bringing a touch of natural beauty and simple pleasure to digital conversations.
